title: LHF Chicago Script released
content:
Hi !

I just finished a new script for [www.Letterheadfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013144816/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "www.Letterheadfonts.com") It is called Chicago Script. It is a period style script with lots of alternate characters and some ligatures.

Thanks for taking a look.

Have a nice day,

\_Charles Borges de Oliveira
author: Charles_borges_...

comments.content: Beautiful work, Charles. Perhaps your best. Sorry to see it's only available from LHF.
Thank you Stephen for the nice compliment!
